member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.AccessibilityExtensions

member.summary: Gets the awaiter that encapsulates an operation that buffers a list of videos in-memory,

member.summary: Standard resolution thumbnail URL. Not always available.

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Common.ThumbnailSet.MaxResUrl
member.summary: Max resolution thumbnail URL. Not always available.

member.summary: Exception thrown when a fatal failure occurs.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Exceptions.RequestLimitExceededException
member.summary: Exception thrown when YouTube denies a request because the client has exceeded rate limit.

member.summary: Exception thrown when a transient failure occurs.

member.summary: Exception thrown when the requested video is unavailable.

member.summary: Exception thrown when the requested video is unplayable.

member.summary: Parent class for domain exceptions thrown by .

member.summary: Playlist author. Can be null if it's a system playlist (e.g. Video Mix, Topics, etc.).

member.summary: Available thumbnails for this playlist. Can be null if the playlist is empty.

member.summary: Encapsulates a valid YouTube playlist ID.

member.summary: Attempts to parse the specified string as a playlist ID or URL. Returns null in case of failure.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaption
member.summary: Text that gets displayed at specific time during video playback, as part of a .

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaption.Offset
member.summary: Time at which this caption starts being displayed.

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaption.Parts
member.summary: Caption parts (usually individual words). May be empty because not all captions contain parts.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaption.TryGetPartByTime(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets the caption part displayed at the specified point in time, relative to this caption's offset. Returns null if not found. Note that some captions may not have any parts at all.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionClient
member.summary: Queries related to closed captions of YouTube videos.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionClient.GetManifestAsync(YoutubeExpld.Videos.VideoId)
member.summary: Gets the manifest that contains information about available closed caption tracks in the specified video.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionClient.GetAsync(YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionTrackInfo)
member.summary: Gets the actual closed caption track which is identified by the specified metadata.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionClient.WriteToAsync(YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionTrackInfo,System.IO.TextWriter,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes the actual closed caption track which is identified by the specified metadata to the specified writer. Closed captions are written in the SRT file format.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionClient.DownloadAsync(YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionTrackInfo,System.String,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads the actual closed caption track which is identified by the specified metadata to the specified file. Closed captions are written in the SRT file format.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionManifest
member.summary: Manifest that contains information about available closed caption tracks in a specific video.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionManifest.TryGetByLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the closed caption track in the specified language. Returns null if not found.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionPart
member.summary: Part of a closed caption (usually a single word).

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionPart.Text
member.summary: Text displayed by this caption part.

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionPart.Offset
member.summary: Time at which this caption part starts being displayed (relative to the caption's own offset).

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionTrack
member.summary: Track that contains closed captions in a specific language.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.ClosedCaptionTrack.TryGetByTime(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets the caption displayed at the specified point in time. Returns null if not found.

member.summary: Whether the associated track was automatically generated.

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.ClosedCaptions.Language.Name
member.summary: Full English name of this language.

member.summary: YouTube media stream that only contains audio.

member.summary: Container name. Can be used as file extension.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.IAudioStreamInfo
member.summary: YouTube media stream that contains audio.

member.name: P:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.IStreamInfo.Tag
member.summary: Stream tag. Uniquely identifies a stream inside a manifest.

member.summary: Gets the stream with highest bitrate. Returns null if sequence is empty.

member.summary: YouTube media stream that contains video.

member.summary: Video quality label, as seen on YouTube.

member.summary: Gets all video qualities available in a collection of video streams.

member.summary: Gets video quality labels of all streams available in a collection of video streams.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.VideoStreamInfoExtensions.WithHighestVideoQuality(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.IVideoStreamInfo})
member.summary: Gets the video stream with highest video quality. Returns null if sequence is empty.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.MuxedStreamInfo
member.summary: YouTube media stream that contains both audio and video.

member.name: T:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.StreamManifest
member.summary: Manifest that contains information about available media streams in a specific video.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.StreamManifest.GetAudio
member.summary: Gets streams that contain audio (which includes muxed and audio-only streams).

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.StreamManifest.GetVideo
member.summary: Gets streams that contain video (which includes muxed and video-only streams).

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.StreamManifest.GetMuxed
member.summary: Gets muxed streams (contain both audio and video). Note that muxed streams are limited in quality and don't go beyond 720p30.

member.name: M:YoutubeExpld.Videos.Streams.StreamManifest.GetVideoOnly
member.summary: Gets video-only streams (no audio). These streams have the widest range of qualities available.

member.summary: Gets the HTTP Live Stream (HLS) manifest URL for the specified video (if it's a live video stream).

member.summary: Gets the actual stream which is identified by the specified metadata.

member.summary: Copies the actual stream which is identified by the specified metadata to the specified stream.

member.summary: Download the actual stream which is identified by the specified metadata to the specified file.

member.summary: YouTube media stream that only contains video.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that is allowed as an input even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that is disallowed as an input even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a method that will never return under any circumstance.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method will not return if the associated parameter is passed the specified value.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.ParameterValue
member.summary: Gets the condition parameter value. Code after the method is considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified parameter value.
member.param: The condition parameter value. Code after the method is considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output may be even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter may be even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be .

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output is not even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the output will be non- if the named parameter is non-.

member.summary: Gets the associated parameter name. The output will be non- if the argument to the parameter specified is non-.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the associated parameter name.
member.param: The associated parameter name. The output will be non- if the argument to the parameter specified is non-.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter will not be even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be .

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
